GSD.description:
arm64: mm: Don't invalidate FROM_DEVICE buffers at start of DMA transfer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.201 by commit 7b9c3bfbad2510478ac29221d2c40a09184ce6a1. For more details please see the references link.
